statement: Based on the specification document for 2N2222 and 2N2222A NPN switching transistors, answer the following questions.
questions: What is the maximum collector-emitter voltage (V_CEO) for the 2N2222A transistor? (A) 30 V (B) 40 V (C) 75 V (D) 800 mA
List the pin configuration for the NPN transistor as described in the document.
Calculate the power dissipation if the collector current is 500 mA and the collector-emitter voltage is 10 V.
explanations: According to the document, the maximum collector-emitter voltage V_CEO for the 2N2222A transistor is 40 V.
The document provides a pinning table showing the configuration: pin 1 is the emitter, pin 2 is the base, and pin 3 is the collector.
Power dissipation P = V * I = 10 V * 500 mA = 5 W.
